dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] illegal activities?]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2005 11:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; david.petley@swishzone.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] illegal activities?]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] illegal activities?
Date: Sat, 2 Jul 2005 07:14:26 +1000 (EST)
From: David Petley <david.petley@swishzone.com>
Reply-To: david.petley@swishzone.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: admins@theplanet.com

Hi,
My name is David Petley, I am the Support manager for SWiSHzone.com,
software developers (SWiSHmax & SWiSHv2 amongst others).

It has come to our attention that a site, seemingly hosted by you, is
selling illegal versions of our software products.

The site in question is http://www.unparagoned.net [67.18.182.218] -
www.unparagoned.net - 218.67.18.182

The software in question is SWISHmax and SWiSHv2. These people are NOT
resellers for our products.

Before proceeding with a more intense legal response with these illegal
sellers, I am requesting you to remove the illegal material from your
servers.

Please let me know what action you take, and whether you can provide
information to assist us to take further legal action.

Thanks for your attention,

David Petley
Support Manager, SWiSHzone.com





- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCyrJMvK/XpJs6oyURAjmiAJsGeEMxLkZ+HUftgaUZG8wGDi4bfQCdGKsS
tPpNEf3TLgDEwLimTlgCeEE=
=Fqjl
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
